updates.HtmlString: Updated foil chances. Now 15/67 chance a booster has a foil, includes basic lands, and staring with this set, it always replaces a common.
Morning: Upgraded to newest version, fixed many rarity/colour/type data errors, added Fat Pack and Event Deck.

Evening: I've fixed the basic land slot with the proper basic land, added the proper backs to all Hero cards, and make a very fake, very wrong seeded booster that contains only the colour you chose, colourless, and multicolour. I know there probably shouldn't be multicolour that don't include the colour you chose, but it'll have to do for now.
